An Iconic Neptune Beach bar
Soaked in Tradition and Flavor
Welcome to Lemon Bar — where Lemon Street meets the ocean! You will find us serving up beach-inspired cocktails, from our signature Goombay Smashes and Watermelon Refreshers to our awe-inspiring frozen Orange Dreams and Piña Coladas.
Over the last 23 years we have evolved into what we believe is everyone's escape from the day-to-day, a slice of paradise in their own backyard. We offer beachside seating, breathtaking views of the Atlantic Ocean, and though we're not open for sunrise, the moonrises are simply incredible. There's nothing more enjoyable than sipping on your favorite ice cold beverage, encompassed by the warmth of the Florida sun and the cool ocean breeze blowing.
We have the best Happy Hour in town, starting at 11 am Monday through Friday. Come see us and enjoy all we have to offer: delicious cocktails, a relaxing atmosphere, friendly staff, fantastic food, live music and so much more. Get away from it all and escape to the little piece of paradise we call Lemon Bar!
Our
Lemon Bar
Team
Meet the passionate individuals behind Lemon Bar!
Kate M.
I have been at Lemon Bar for 4 years and love that I get to come into work every  day and look at the beach and listen to the ocean — one of the reasons I moved  down here. I have been in the restaurant and bar business for 28 years and love  meeting new people and hearing new stories every day. My favorite drink on the  menu is the Beaches Lemonade — can’t go wrong with a little watermelon flavor! Being a vegetarian, my favorite menu item is the veggie wrap. It’s perfect in the summertime!
General Manager
Jonathan F.
For more than 20 years I’ve been a chef, and I’ve been with Lemon Bar for the past two years. I have a passion for cooking and get satisfaction when I see people enjoying the dishes I cook for them. My favorite item on the menu is the Peruvian wings. You must get them grilled and the sauce is out of this world! It pairs nicely with an ice cold Duke’s Brown Ale. My favorite hobby is going to concerts and raves. Favorite artists are Rufus Du Sol and favorite band is Widespread Panic.
Kitchen Manager
Melissa K.
For the past six years, I’ve worked at the Lemon Bar! I love working by the beach and in my free time you can find me at the beach soaking in the sun. My favorite hidden drink (not on the menu anymore but can still get) is the Cocorita — nothing says I’m on vacation or chilling by the beach like a coconut-flavored margarita. My favorite food item is the turkey & brie sandwich. The jam is always changing, which gives it a different flavor throughout the seasons. My local favorite band was Tad Jennings until he moved, but I enjoy all the live music we have on the weekends.
Supervisor
Chance L.
I have been working at Lemon Bar for almost four years. You can’t beat working  outside right by the beach! In my free time I love playing video games and going to  concerts. I also have a passion to DJ and in my spare time you can catch me  spinning a record or two. I am a huge hockey fan with Washington Capitals as my  team I root for. If you can’t decide on a cocktail the Ocean Cucumber is my favorite and you can have it made with either gin or vodka. The chicken tenders are my go-to food item on the menu.
Manager

Join us every Friday, Saturday, and Sunday for live music that sets the perfect backdrop for your beachside experience. Our talented house bands create an unforgettable atmosphere where you can unwind and enjoy the vibrant energy of Neptune Beach.
